price: ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ߥߊ߲߬ߘߌ ߟߊߖߌ߰ ߟߊ߫߸ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߴߊ߬ ߞߣߐ߬ߜߍ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā al-dhik'ra wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
